pkgmetadata.longdescription: PYTMC=====.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/pcdshub/pytmc.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/pcdshub/pytmcGenerate Epics DB records from TwinCAT .tmc files.See the `docs <https://pcdshub.github.io/pytmc/>`_ for more information.=============== =====Compatibility======================python 3.6, 3.7 .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/pcdshub/pytmc.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/pcdshub/pytmc=============== =====
